attires.name: Sarafan
attires.description: A traditional Russian jumper dress or pinafore dress, worn by women and girls. It is often worn over a blouse.

attires.name: Kosovorotka
attires.description: A traditional Russian shirt, which has a-side placket. The placket is positioned to the side, instead of centrally, as is common on Western-style shirts.

attires.name: Telogreika
attires.description: A type of padded winter jacket that was issued to the Soviet Army. It is a simple, quilted jacket.
